FontString.name: Instruction Text
FontString.text: The following will be cast when clicking on the CT RaidAssist|n emergency monitor and raid windows.

FontString.name: Instruction Text2
FontString.text: These spells will be cast when you press the bound button. |n The CT Raid Assist emergency monitor must be on for these to work.
